title: Web 2.0-Based Language Learning Design: Adaptive Instructional Methods for Offline Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and proficiency in fundamental smartphone functions
context.additional_context: Requirement for flexible learning schedules and smartphone-centric activity design for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners complete one peer-feedback-based language project using Web 2.0 tools (e.g., blogs, collaborative notes)
Learners generate self-directed learning materials at least twice weekly using mobile-accessible Web 2.0 tools
Learners engage in three or more activities to enhance linguistic expression and critical thinking in digital collaborative environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
